clone() - Method in class Flower
 
combine(Pot, Pot) - Static method in class Pot
Combine the flowers from each pot into one containing only unique colours.
contains(Flower) - Method in class Pot
Search this pot for a flower that matches the given parameter exactly (case insensitive) in terms of colour, species, age (within the nearest whole number) and height (within 0.001).
If the given flower is null, return whether this pot has empty space.
containsColour(String) - Method in class Pot
Search this pot for a flower that matches the given colour (case insensitive).
containsType(String) - Method in class Pot
Search this pot for a flower that matches the given species (case insensitive).

G

getAge() - Method in class Flower
Return the flower's age.
getColour() - Method in class Flower
 
getHeight() - Method in class Flower
Height is determined by the following formula: H = (2/pi) * tan^-1(age/maxHeight) * maxHeight
getShape() - Method in class Pot
 
getSpecies() - Method in class Flower
 
grow() - Method in class Flower
The flower grows, increasing its age by 1.
growInside(Pot) - Method in class Flower
For each free space inside the pot, the flower grows an additional 0.5 units, up to a maximum of 2.5 units additional.
It still grows by a base of 1 each time, so the total maximum growth is 3.5.
Dead flowers cannot grow anymore.

insert(Flower) - Method in class Pot

R

rearrange() - Method in class Pot
Remove all dead flowers from this pot.
replace(Flower, Flower) - Method in class Pot
Replace all the flowers matching f1 with f2.
replaceColour(String, Flower) - Method in class Pot
Replace all the flowers matching the given colour criterion with f.
If f is null, remove the matching flowers from the pot.
replaceType(String, Flower) - Method in class Pot
Replace all the flowers matching the given species criterion with f.
If f is null, remove the matching flowers from the pot.
